content.rendered:
D’LASHES PRODUCTS AND GIFTS

It’s never too early to start your holiday shopping! D’Lashes has all the best gifts for beauty product lovers like our famous lashes, luxury candles, makeup, and a-list lash extensions gift cards appointments. These make perfect birthday gifts or “just thinking about you” gifts.

Also, since the holiday season is almost upon us, don’t forget to book your lash extensions appointments early so that you can show off those fluttery lashes to all the festive holiday gatherings. 

Click on the following product names to shop – D’Lashes Matte Lipstick, D’Lashes Candles, New Lash Adhesive Eyeliner, our Lash Wash, and lash out with D’Medium Flare individual lashes and our popular D’Wispy Lashes.

Xo Xo, Dionne
